tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Amazing Dr., So friendly with the kid, was calming us down as we were worried about our child's health. It was a lovely experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr.Manu is brilliant ! Right from the day we met her to follow-ups , we felt we had made the right choice. Her expertise is amazing and she was extremely patient in hearing our detailed stories about our daughter's symptoms. We have seen quick recovery and will definitely recommend Happy & Healthy Clinic to all our family and friends.
The Dr's interest level on looking into patient's concerns is too low, Dr's tone and action shows urgency to close the meeting session
